palamu ardhaye di wishishta karyasadhanayak athkara gath athara pasugiya wasare palamu ardhayedi rupiyal biliyana 3.38 k wu badupera labhaya mema wasare salaka balanu labana kalasimawa wana wita rupiyal biliyana 3.69 k bawata path kara ganimin 8% ka wardhanayak wartha kirimata samath wiya. 2014 wasare palamu ardhaye pawathi awama labha thaththwayan naya poli anupathayan pahatha watima saha ukas katayuthu aashrithawa rupiyal biliyana 1.5 ka mudalak kapa harima aadi abhiyoga madhyaye wuwada hatan nashanal bankuwa mema wardhanayata himikam kiya.

manawa himikam kadawima sambandhayen apage waradi soyana boho ratawal apa rate thrasthawadaya poshanaya karana ha ee wenuwen mudal ras karana ayata thawamath rakawaranaya salasana bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.sathya dana ganimata me kandayamata kisidu awashyathawak nathi bawa sandahan kala janadhipathiwaraya manawa ayithin surakima athin apa lowa kisiwakuta dewani nowana bawa awadharanaya kaleya.balawath ratawal pawa thrasthawadayen bata kamin sitiya di thrasthawadaya parajaya kala haki bawa lowatama penwa dunne shri lankawa yayi janadhipathiwaraya pawasiya.shri lankawa thrasthawadaya parajaya kirimen pasu dakunu aasiyawatama thrasthawadaya parajaya kirime anubalayak labunu bawath janadhipathiwaraya prakasha kaleya.janadhipathiwaraya mese prakasha kale sanwardhanaya saha sahayogithawa pilibanda dakunu aasiyanu samuluwata, kolambaa galadhari hotalaye di eeye (04) ekwemini.

siya pa්rajathantha්ra wirodhi kriyakarithwayan sambandhayen nithiye mukthiyada athulu asimitha bala thala walin polis niladharin sannaddha karamin aanduwa militari-polisi athulu mardana upakarana wada wadath balawath kirima ahambayak ho shri lankawata sima wuwak nowe.

wathman rajaya janathawage abhiwruddhiya thaka thorathuru thakshanaya diyunu kirimata katayuthu karana athare atham piris ema thakshanayama bhawitha karamin rate gaurawaya kelesimata uthsaha karana bawa ki janadhipathiwaraya ema thathwaya wataha gena boru pracharawalata norawati aanduwa ha thaman pilibandawa wishwasa kara katayuthu karana men wides ratawala sitina shri lankikayangen illa sitiyeya.

rajaye madhyae nidahasa kridhayathmaka wanne janatha apekshawa itu kirimatada prathiwiplawaya magin apawa yatath kirimata bala sitina bedumwadinge saha yatathwijithawadinge awashyashathawaya anuwada yanna yali salaka balana lesa illa sitimi. 29 wathawak prathikshepa wunu sulutharayak himi ranil wikramasinha mahatha agamathi lesa path kirima maithriipala mahatha widhayaka balathala bhawitha kala prathama awasthawayi.
ee aya wenuwen rathnashri wijesinhayan liyu kaw pada saha geya padamala kipayakda samagini.

ee kawarak wuwath awasan arthakathanaya thindu kerenne shreshtadhikaranayehidi yaga agawinisuru wisin ee wenuwen winisuru ma`dullak nam kala yuthuwe namla dan janadhipathita awashya winisuru ma`dullak nam kara ganime siyalu idakada athaga pasugiya sathi kihipaye purappadu wu winisuru thanathuru 03 tala path kerena winisuruwan thindu kerenne janadhipathige abhimathaya anuwa heyiniga enisa eela`ga janadhipathiwaranaya awasan washayen thindu wanne janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha ha aasannama kihipadenage kamaththa akamaththa matha pamaniga eeta amatharawa yamak ekathu wanne namla ee janadhipathi jyothishya upadeshakayangeni.ewani ratakala wipakshaye hamoma danatamath janadhipathi podu apekshakayaku soyathiga mita awuruddakatath ihathin widhayaka janadhipathi dhuraya ahosi kirima ekama karanawa lesa tharka karamin ee sandaha wishwasawanthama apekshakaya pujya maduluwawe sobhitha himiyayi pirisak gosa kalaha.
wisheshayen mema shithakaranayata kal ikuthwu aahara haduna ganime hakiyawada pawathi.
